articles.description: Science often accommodates audacious proposals.

articles.author: Ethan Siegel
articles.title: Scalar fields: the secret sauce of theoretical physics - Big Think
articles.description: Scalars, vectors, and tensors come up all the time in physics. They're more than mathematical structures. They help describe the Universe.
